SEARCH
Package CAMSv2

Class Staff

java.lang.Object
CAMSv2.User
CAMSv2.Staff
public class Staff extends User
The Staff Represents a staff member in the system, extending the User class. Staff members have the ability to create and manage camps, approve advice, and generate various reports.

  • Field Summary

      public boolean approveAdvice(Camp camp, int id)
      Approves the advice for a specific camp based on the advice ID.
      Parameters:

      id - The ID of the advice to be approved.
      Returns:
      True if the approval is successful, false otherwise.
